UI_visible_response: Read 22 web pagesView Page DetailsIn 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing, southwest China, experienced a severe accident on September 27. A fire on a conveyor belt produced excessive levels of carbon monoxide, trapping 17 miners underground. Tragically, 16 miners died, and one survivor was hospitalized in critical condition. The mine, owned by a local energy company, had previously faced fines for safety violations. An investigation into the cause of the accident was launched.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: In 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing, southwest China, experienced a severe accident on September 27. A fire on a conveyor belt produced excessive levels of carbon monoxide, trapping 17 miners underground[^1^][^2^]. Tragically, 16 miners died, and one survivor was hospitalized in critical condition[^1^]. The mine, owned by a local energy company, had previously faced fines for safety violations. An investigation into the cause of the accident was launched[^1^][^16^].
